attributes.action: NOT ALLOW PEOPLE TO MAKE ACCUSATIONS ONLINE, BEFORE GOING TO THE POLICE
attributes.additional_details: THE GOVERNMENT OR PARLIAMENT CAN PREVENT ACCUSATIONS GOING FORWARD, PEOPLE ARE GUILTY FROM WHAT PEOPLE SAY ONLINE AND IT CHANGES PUBLIC OPIONS ABOUT PEOPLE WITH FALSE ACCUSATIONS . MAKE IT A LAW TO NOT ALLOW PEOPLE TO MAKE ACCUSATIONS ONLINE AND SOCIAL MEDIA ABOUT PEOPLE, BEFORE GOING TO THE POLICE. THESE ACCUSATIONS ONLINE CAN CAUSE PEOPLE TO SUFFER REALLY BAD WITH MENTAL HEALTH AND IT GIVES THE PUBLIC A OPINION ABOUT PEOPLE BEFORE BEING FOUND GUILTY OF ANY CRIME.
